title: Performance issues in run.py(P2)
body:
Hello,I found a performance issue in the definition of `unimodal` ,
run.py,
[sess = tf.Session(config=session_conf)](https://github.com/soujanyaporia/multimodal-sentiment-analysis/blob/f974f88ec973867b9411966624d732ff6985f66d/run.py#L248)  was repeatedly called in [for mode in modality:](https://github.com/soujanyaporia/multimodal-sentiment-analysis/blob/f974f88ec973867b9411966624d732ff6985f66d/run.py#L388) and was not closed.
I think it will increase the efficiency and avoid out of memory if you close this session after using it.

Here are two files to support this issue,[support1](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.15/api_docs/python/tf/Session.html#close) and [support2](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/48051647/tensorflow-how-to-perform-image-categorisation-on-multiple-images)

Looking forward to your reply. Btw, I am very glad to create a PR to fix it if you are too busy.
